member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer.ReadPotentiometerVoltage
member.summary: Returns the current voltage reading of the potentiometer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer.ReadPotentiometerPercentage
member.summary: Returns the current position of the potentiometer relative to its maximum: range 0.0 to 1.0
